Title: PhD Student
About: I am a PhD student at the University of California, where I am researching computer education. I have taught and organized a range of undergraduate computer science courses as an instructor of record, teaching associate, and graduate teaching assistant. My research interests center on teaching practices, equitable course design, and culturally responsive pedagogy in computer science. I am broadly interested in computer science education, teaching at scale, and the professional development of teaching staff.
